00029 
00030 class MmtkNonOrthorhombicMd_TestCase(unittest.TestCase):
00031     
00032     def setUp(self):
00033         """
00034         do hexagonal argon 2x1x1 supercell from fractional xyz coordinates
00035         """
00036         self.latticelattice=[[2.456, 0.0, 0.0],[-1.228, 2.1269583916945813, 0.0]
00037                  ,[0.0, 0.0, 6.696]]
00038         self.fracUnitCellfracUnitCell=[['ar', 0.0, 0.0, 0.0], ['ar', 0.0, 0.0, 0.5], 
00039                         ['ar', 0.33333000000000002, 0.66666999999999998, 0.0], 
00040                         ['ar', 0.66666999999999998, 0.33333999999999997, 0.5]]
00041         self.supercellFromFracsupercellFromFrac=Supercell(self.fracUnitCellfracUnitCell,self.latticelattice,2,1,1)
00042         self.samplesample = Sample('periodic')
00043         self.samplesample.unitCell = self.supercellFromFracsupercellFromFrac.getSupercellLatticeVectors()
00044         self.samplesample.atoms = self.supercellFromFracsupercellFromFrac.getSupercellRealCoordinates()
00045         self.samplesample.initialTemp = 300.0*Units.K
00046         self.samplesample.forcefields=[]
00047         self.samplesample.forcefields.append(['lennardJonesMmtk',15.0*Units.Ang])
00048 
00049     def testMmtkNonorthogonal(self):
00050         md = Mmtk(self.samplesample)
00051         md.i.ensemble = 'nve'
00052         md.i.timestep = 0.5*Units.fs
00053         md.i.equilibrationTime = 0.005*Units.ps
00054         md.i.productionTime = 0.1*Units.ps
00055         md.i.trajectoryFilename='hexagonalMmtk.nc'
00056         md.i.logFilename='hexagonalMmtk.log'
00057         md.i.restartFilename='hexagonalRestartMmtk.nc'
00058         md.integrate()
00059   
00060 if __name__ == "__main__":
00061     suite3 = unittest.makeSuite(MmtkNonOrthorhombicMd_TestCase)
00062     #alltests = unittest.TestSuite((suite1,suite2,suite3))
00063     alltests = unittest.TestSuite((suite3))
